description: As a speech therapist, I help individuals overcome and prevent communication problems in language, speech, voice and fluency.
description_fr: En tant qu’orthophoniste, j’aide les individus à surmonter ou à prévenir les problèmes de communication liés au langage, à la parole, à la voix et à la fluidité de l’expression.

description: As an operations consultant, I devise business strategies to help solve operational, supply chain, and efficiency problems within different industries.

description: As a fence/deck contractor, I construct or install fences and decks made of wood or composite products.

description: As a business incubator, I help to speed up the growth and success of startups and early stage companies.
